mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_contents ( cid, title, slug, thumb_img, created, modified, content, author_id, type, state, tags, hits, comments_num, allow_comment ) VALUES (NULL,#{title},#{slug},#{thumbImg},NOW(),NOW(), #{content},#{authorId},#{type},#{state},#{tags},0,0,#{allowComment} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_contents SET hits=hits+1 WHERE cid=#{cid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_contents WHERE state =1 AND cid=#{cid}
